componentDescription: A component to securely input one-time passwords or verification codes digit by digit.

id.description: An optional unique identifier for the OTPInput component.

error.description: An optional property to display an error state or message associated with the OTPInput.

helperText.description: Optional text to provide additional information or guidance to the user, displayed below the input.

name.description: An optional name attribute for the input, useful for form submission.

label.description: An optional label to describe the purpose of the OTPInput field to the user.

length.description: The expected number of digits/characters for the OTP.

placeholder.description: Optional placeholder text to display within each individual OTP input field.

isReadOnly.description: A boolean indicating whether the OTPInput fields are read-only and cannot be modified by the user.

isDisabled.description: A boolean indicating whether the OTPInput fields are disabled and non-interactive.

isAutoFocus.description: A boolean that, if true, automatically focuses the first OTP input field upon component mount.

type.description: Specifies the type of input expected in the OTP fields (e.g., numeric, alphanumeric).

onComplete.description: Callback function triggered when all OTP fields have been filled, providing the complete OTP value.

onChange.description: Callback function triggered whenever the overall OTP input value changes.

onChangeText.description: Callback function triggered when the text value within the OTP input changes.

onBlur.description: Callback function triggered when the OTPInput component loses focus.

onKeyPress.description: Callback function triggered on a keyboard key press event within the OTPInput.

onKeyDown.description: Callback function triggered on a keyboard key down event within the OTPInput.

onClick.description: Callback function triggered when the OTPInput component is clicked.

onFocus.description: Callback function triggered when the OTPInput component gains focus.

pattern.description: An optional regular expression or string pattern to validate each digit/character entered.

pasteTransformer.description: A function to transform pasted text before it is inserted into the OTP fields.

stepValues.description: An array of numbers that defines specific allowed values for each OTP input field, often used for custom pin pads.

size.description: Defines the visual size of the individual OTP input fields.

shadow.description: Configures the shadow styling for the OTPInput component.

shape.description: Defines the visual shape of the individual OTP input fields (e.g., square, rounded).

variant.description: Defines the visual variant of the OTP input fields (e.g., filled, outlined).

gap.description: The spacing, in pixels, between the individual OTP input fields.

views.description: An object to apply custom styles to different parts or states of the OTPInput component.
